    Cut Cut Cut

Function reference

Data manipulation

cut3()
Convert numeric to factor weighted and by group
cut3_quantile()
Cut3 by quantile
describe()
Create a table of summaries for an entery dataframe
numeric_month()
Convert a month variable to a numeric format
numeric_quarter()
Convert a quarter variable to a numeric format
one_hot_encoding()
Apply One-Hot-Encoding to factor variables
real_prices_indexer()
Monetary quantities adjusted for inflation `
ts_dummy()
Time Series Dummy Variable
train_test_split()
Split dataset into train and test sets
train_split()
Get train set from a dataset split
test_split()
Get test set from a dataset split
valid_split()
Get valiation set from a dataset split (if exists)
vars_to_date()
Multiple variables to unique date variable

HTML tools

progress_bar()
Html progress bar
big_button()
Insert a SVG/HTML big button
insert_html() insertHTML()
Insert HTML file into another

Utilities

Working with the system and extra tools

use_renv()
Initialize renv
db_connect()
Conexión a bases de datos
dbConnect()
Conexión a bases de datos
Sys_Date_locale()
System date with specific format and locale
octave_path()
Retrieve octave path
